Package com.csse3200.game.components.player

Class PlayerStatsDisplayTester

java.lang.Object
com.csse3200.game.components.Component
com.csse3200.game.rendering.RenderComponent
com.csse3200.game.ui.UIComponent
com.csse3200.game.components.player.PlayerStatsDisplay
com.csse3200.game.components.player.PlayerStatsDisplayTester
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Disposable, Renderable, Comparable<Renderable>
public class PlayerStatsDisplayTester extends PlayerStatsDisplay
A tester class for the PlayerStatsDisplay component that tests various methods for displaying player stats, such as creating actors, initializing animations, and updating player stats.

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerStatsDisplayTester

      public PlayerStatsDisplayTester()

  • Method Details

    • testCreate

      public static void testCreate(boolean addActorsTester, Entity entity)
      Tests the create() method by checking if the actors were successfully added and if the event listeners were correctly registered for player stats (health, experience, hunger) were registered.
      Parameters:
      addActorsTester - a boolean indicating whether the actors were added successfully
      entity - the player entity whose events are being checked for listeners

    • testInitBarAnimation

      public static void testInitBarAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureAtlas[] textureAtlas, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> healthBarAnimation, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> hungerBarAnimation, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> xpBarAnimation)
      Tests the initBarAnimations() method by checking the initialization of the texture atlas and frames for health, hunger, and experience bar animations.
      Parameters:
      textureAtlas - an array of TextureAtlas objects used for animations
      healthBarAnimation - the animation for the health bar
      hungerBarAnimation - the animation for the hunger bar
      xpBarAnimation - the animation for the experience bar

    • testUpdatePlayerStatsUI

      public static void testUpdatePlayerStatsUI(int maxStats, int stat, String statName)
      Tests the updatePlayerStatsUI() method by checking if the max stats and current stats for a given stat name are within the correct ranges. Shows error if not correct ranges
      Parameters:
      maxStats - the maximum value for the stat
      stat - the current value for the stat
      statName - the name of the stat being checked (e.g., health, hunger, experience)
